prompts.enrichment_instruction: Given the following blog post content, provide a summary (no more than 350 characters), a list of the 5 most important SEO keywords, and a classification of its inbound marketing 'funnel_stage' (ToFu, MoFu, or BoFu). Use the following definitions: ToFu (Awareness) is educational, problem-focused content; MoFu (Consideration) is solution-focused content; BoFu (Decision) is product-focused content. Return a JSON object with 'summary', 'seo_keywords', and 'funnel_stage' keys.
